item.title: azure: [In preview] Public Preview: Azure MySQL Self Heal
item.description:
Azure Database for MySQL â€“ Flexible Server now offers a Self-Heal feature in Public Preview that provides self-healing tools to proactively resolve common server issues (for example, unresponsive servers) without needing to open a support case.
